name: app/src/main/res/layout/activity_order_details.xml
content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="fill_parent"
    android:layout_height="fill_parent"
    android:background="@color/white"
    android:orientation="vertical"
    tools:context="app.infiniverse.grocery.OrderDetailsActivity">

        <include layout="@layout/toolbar" />

        <ProgressBar
            android:id="@+id/progressBar"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_gravity="center"
            android:layout_marginTop="35dp"
            android:visibility="gone" />

        <LinearLayout
            android:id="@+id/ll_item_products"
            android:layout_width="fill_parent"
            android:layout_height="0dp"
            android:layout_marginBottom="10dp"
            android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"
            android:layout_marginStart="8dp"
            android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
            android:layout_weight="1"
            android:orientation="vertical"
            android:visibility="gone">


            <android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
                android:id="@+id/recyclerview_item_orders"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
        </LinearLayout>

        <LinearLayout
            android:id="@+id/ll_item"
            android:layout_width="fill_parent"
            android:visibility="gone"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:background="@color/holo_red_dark"
            android:gravity="bottom|end">


            <android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout
                android:layout_width="fill_parent"
                android:layout_height="60dp"
                android:layout_gravity="bottom"
                android:background="@drawable/box6"
                android:baselineAligned="false"
                android:orientation="vertical">

                <TextView
                    android:id="@+id/textView3"
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_marginStart="8dp"
                    android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
                    android:text="Total Savings : "
                    android:textColor="@color/black"
                    app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                    app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />

                <TextView
                    android:id="@+id/total_discount"
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:text=""
                    app:layout_constraintBaseline_toBaselineOf="@+id/textView3"
                    app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/total_amount" />

                <TextView
                    android:id="@+id/textView5"
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_marginStart="8dp"
                    android:layout_marginTop="3dp"
                    android:text="Payable Amount : "
                    android:textColor="@color/black"
                    android:textStyle="bold"
                    app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                    app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textView3" />

                <TextView
                    android:id="@+id/total_amount"
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="18dp"
                    android:layout_marginStart="8dp"
                    android:text=""
                    android:textColor="@color/black"
                    android:textStyle="bold"
                    app:layout_constraintBaseline_toBaselineOf="@+id/textView5"
                    app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/textView5" />



            </android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout>
        </LinearLayout>

</LinearLayout>
explanation:
1. The root LinearLayout is translated to a Column component with width and height set to '100%'. The background color is set using the $r resource syntax.
2. The include tag for the toolbar is assumed to be defined elsewhere and is represented by a Toolbar component.
3. The ProgressBar is translated to a ProgressBar component with width and height set to 'auto', aligned to the center, and visibility set to hidden.
4. The LinearLayout for products is translated to a Column component containing a List component (RecyclerView equivalent) with dynamic content.
5. The LinearLayout for item details is translated to a Column component containing a Flex component (ConstraintLayout equivalent) with Text components for displaying the details.
6. All components and their properties are translated according to the provided rules and the Harmony ArkUI documentation.
